name: AVAudioPlayerDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines the methods to respond to audio playback events and decoding errors.

items.name: func audioPlayerDidFinishPlaying(AVAudioPlayer, successfully: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the audio finishes playing.

items.name: func audioPlayerDecodeErrorDidOccur(AVAudioPlayer, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when an audio player encounters a decoding error during playback.
